title: Still Some Air — And Questions — In 'Deflategate' Scandal
teaser: The NFL's "deflategate" scandal raises a slew of questions: How much can you scuff a football? Where is the line between gamesmanship and cheating? Slate's Mike Pesca answers them all with NPR's Rachel Martin.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
